Train Station.english: 1. The train station is crowded with people.
Train Station.italian: La stazione ferroviaria è affollata di persone.
Train Station.spanish: La estación de tren está abarrotada de gente.
Train Station.german: Der Bahnhof ist überfüllt mit Menschen.

Train Station.english: 2. I need to buy a train ticket.
Train Station.italian: Devo comprare un biglietto del treno.
Train Station.spanish: Necesito comprar un billete de tren.
Train Station.german: Ich muss eine Zugfahrkarte kaufen.

Train Station.english: 3. The train is delayed.
Train Station.italian: Il treno è in ritardo.
Train Station.spanish: El tren está retrasado.
Train Station.german: Der Zug hat Verspätung.

Train Station.english: 4. The platform is on the second floor.
Train Station.italian: Il binario si trova al secondo piano.
Train Station.spanish: El andén está en el segundo piso.
Train Station.german: Der Bahnsteig ist im zweiten Stock.

Train Station.english: 5. I missed my train.
Train Station.italian: Ho perso il mio treno.
Train Station.spanish: Perdí mi tren.
Train Station.german: Ich habe meinen Zug verpasst.

Train Station.english: 6. The train is arriving at platform 3.
Train Station.italian: Il treno sta arrivando al binario 3.
Train Station.spanish: El tren está llegando al andén 3.
Train Station.german: Der Zug kommt auf Gleis 3 an.

Train Station.english: 7. The train station has a coffee shop.
Train Station.italian: La stazione ferroviaria ha un bar.
Train Station.spanish: La estación de tren tiene una cafetería.
Train Station.german: Der Bahnhof hat eine Kaffeebar.

Train Station.english: 8. The train to Milan departs at 7:30.
Train Station.italian: Il treno per Milano parte alle 7:30.
Train Station.spanish: El tren a Milán sale a las 7:30.
Train Station.german: Der Zug nach Mailand fährt um 7:30 ab.

Train Station.english: 9. The train station is wheelchair accessible.
Train Station.italian: La stazione ferroviaria è accessibile alle sedie a rotelle.
Train Station.spanish: La estación de tren es accesible para sillas de ruedas.
Train Station.german: Der Bahnhof ist rollstuhlgerecht.

Train Station.english: 10. The train conductor checked my ticket.
Train Station.italian: Il controllore del treno ha controllato il mio biglietto.
Train Station.spanish: El revisor del tren revisó mi billete.
Train Station.german: Der Zugbegleiter hat meine Fahrkarte kontrolliert.

Train Station.english: 11. The train station is equipped with elevators.
Train Station.italian: La stazione ferroviaria è dotata di ascensori.
Train Station.spanish: La estación de tren está equipada con ascensores.
Train Station.german: Der Bahnhof ist mit Aufzügen ausgestattet.

Train Station.english: 12. The train is going in the opposite direction.
Train Station.italian: Il treno sta andando nella direzione opposta.
Train Station.spanish: El tren va en dirección opuesta.
Train Station.german: Der Zug fährt in die entgegengesetzte Richtung.

Train Station.english: 13. The train station has a taxi stand.
Train Station.italian: La stazione ferroviaria ha una postazione di taxi.
Train Station.spanish: La estación de tren tiene una parada de taxis.
Train Station.german: Der Bahnhof hat einen Taxistand.

Train Station.english: 14. The train is running on time.
Train Station.italian: Il treno è puntuale.
Train Station.spanish: El tren está en hora.
Train Station.german: Der Zug fährt pünktlich.

Train Station.english: 15. The train station has restrooms.
Train Station.italian: La stazione ferroviaria ha dei bagni.
Train Station.spanish: La estación de tren tiene baños.
Train Station.german: Der Bahnhof hat Toiletten.

Train Station.english: 16. The train is full, there are no seats available.
Train Station.italian: Il treno è pieno, non ci sono posti disponibili.
Train Station.spanish: El tren está lleno, no hay asientos disponibles.
Train Station.german: Der Zug ist voll, es gibt keine freien Plätze.

Train Station.english: 17. The train station has a lost and found office.
Train Station.italian: La stazione ferroviaria ha un ufficio oggetti smarriti.
Train Station.spanish: La estación de tren tiene una oficina de objetos perdidos.
Train Station.german: Der Bahnhof hat ein Fundbüro.

Train Station.english: 18. The train is approaching the station.
Train Station.italian: Il treno si sta avvicinando alla stazione.
Train Station.spanish: El tren se acerca a la estación.
Train Station.german: Der Zug nähert sich dem Bahnhof.

Train Station.english: 19. The train station has a bookshop.
Train Station.italian: La stazione ferroviaria ha una libreria.
Train Station.spanish: La estación de tren tiene una librería.
Train Station.german: Der Bahnhof hat eine Buchhandlung.

Train Station.english: 20. The train is leaving in five minutes.
Train Station.italian: Il treno parte tra cinque minuti.
Train Station.spanish: El tren sale en cinco minutos.
Train Station.german: Der Zug fährt in fünf Minuten ab.
